div.head: 不收
div.div: inability to contract; failure to receive

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: inability to contract; failure to receive

sense.def: Illness Sign ofa) limbs and trunk, joints and sinews that are slack and have no strength so that they cannot be moved. 肢體、關節、筋脈緩弱無力，不任動作。 Su wen 素問 69: 甚則肌肉萎，足痿不收 , “If [the excess of the qi of soil] is severe, the muscles and the flesh decay. The legs become dysfunctional and cannot be contracted ”.b) Body organs that irrevocably descend from their regular position. Tai ping sheng hui fang 太平聖惠方 86: 瀉痢頻並，下部開張，肛門不收 , “Diarrhea and free-flux illness frequently occur together. The [body’s] lower parts open and distend. The anus [prolapse] cannot be contracted ”.c) Inability to control the “essence spirit”, i.e. mental disorder. Zhong zang jing 中藏經 Fj: 精神不收，此五臟之虛也 , “When the essence spirit cannot be held together , this is because of a depletion of the five depots”.d) An inability of the eyes to collect light and to see things clearly. Yuan ji qi wei 原機啟微 Fj: 久則光不收，遂 為廢疾 , “After an extended period of time [the eyes] do not receive light. This results in a disability ailment”. e) Wounds unable to close and heal properly by themselves. Wai ke li li 外科理例 3: 兩月餘氣血復而瘡亦愈，但一口不收 , “Over a period of more than two months qi and blood recovered and the wounds healed too. Only one opening failed to contract”. Bu shui 不睡 , inability to sleep [19]

①IS, Pathological Condition identical with bu mian 不眠 , insomnia. Ben cao shi yi 本草拾遺 Substance Entry ku zhu sun 苦竹 筍：主不睡，去面目並舌上熱黃 , “It controls inability to sleep and removes heat yellowness from face, eyes and tongue”.

② Therapeutic Effect of preventing a person from falling asleep. Ming yi bie lu 名醫別錄 Substance Entry ma 馬：頭骨， 主喜眠，令人不睡 , “Its skull bones master an inclination to sleep; they make people unable to sleep ”.
